profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.11 XMP Package - PDF/A Identification Schema.
profile.description: A Level A conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as A. A Level B conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as B.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: A Level A conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as A. A Level B conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as B.

error.message: The "conformance" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is %1 instead of "B" for PDF/A-1b conforming file.
